title: Lewis & Clark National Historic Trail: People
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     People               People       The efforts of many individuals and groups – among them military men and scientists, a president and a slave, women and men, French-speaking boatmen and American Indians – determined the fate of the Corps of Discovery.  Learn more about the Expedition members by checking out the links below or visit one of our partner sites.                      Sacagawea   Learn about the woman who was instrumental in helping Lewis and Clark with the Expedition.          William Clark   Not a Captain?           Meriwether Lewis   Chosen by the president to lead the Corps of Discovery           Thomas Jefferson   The man with the vision          York
